subject: Re: Evp Listener???---Radio Shack Parts
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Hi Al,

It would all depend on the device or ??? emitting the current/energy. 
A telephone does not emit very much power, hence the coil needing to 
be right next to the device.
But there are other devices that send out much higher amplitude 
signals.
I guess it would depend on what is being received as to how far away 
the coil could sense it.
The amplifier circuit does assist, but just how much is the question.

The coil would have to be near the source or the "source" could come 
near the coil... if you get my drift :-)

When dealing with the unknown... anything is worth a try.  You never 
known what might just be the right combination when dealing with the 
paranormal.

- Mike C. (UFO Geek)
